item.title: 中国深化对Meta收购Manus公司20亿美元交易的审查
item.description: 北京正深入调查Meta Platforms公司以20亿美元收购中国创立的人工智能初创企业Manus一事，若发现违规行为，监管机构可能寻求修改甚至撤销该交易的风险正在上升。【原文：Beijing is deepening an investigation into Meta Platforms Inc.’s $2 billion acquisition of Chinese-founded AI startup Manus, raising the risk that regulators will seek to alter or even unwind the deal if wrongdoing is found.】

item.title: 戈东加瓦淡化南非预算案重大税制改革
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克·戈东瓦纳表示，下月预算案不会实施重大税制改革，并强调必须确保财政整顿工作按计划推进。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana ruled out any major tax changes in next month’s budget and stressed the importance of keeping fiscal consolidation on track.】

item.title: 国防大亨斯特纳德在IPO后财富飙升至370亿美元
item.description: 在捷克国防巨头米哈尔·斯特拉纳德的军工企业股票上市首日大涨后，其财富飙升至370亿美元。【原文：Michal Strnad saw his wealth soar to $37 billion after shares in the Czech defense tycoon’s armaments firm jumped in their trading debut.】

item.title: 英国PMI显示私营部门增长迅猛，创21个月新高
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，英国科技和金融服务企业推动了近两年来最快的私营部门增长，预算案公布后企业高管纷纷批准新项目。【原文：British technology and financial services firms drove the fastest private-sector growth in almost two years, according to a closely watched survey that showed bosses approving new projects after the budget.】

item.title: TikTok交易对该应用在美国未来发展的意义
item.description: 围绕TikTok美国业务未来的多年纷争终于尘埃落定。这家社交媒体平台于1月23日宣布，其美国业务已被甲骨文公司牵头的财团收购，正式落实了特朗普政府去年9月提出的交易方案。【原文：The yearslong saga over the future of TikTok’s American operations has finally reached a conclusion. The social media platform said on Jan. 23 that its US arm has been bought by a consortium led by Oracle Corp., formalizing the deal outlined by the Trump administration in September.】

item.title: 日本官员片山称正以紧迫感关注外汇市场
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山萨季周五表示，日本金融当局正以紧迫感密切关注汇率波动，但市场对一个多小时前发生的日元剧烈波动仍一无所知。【原文：Japanese financial authorities are watching currency movements with a sense of urgency, Japan’s Minister of Finance Satsuki Katayama said Friday, keeping the market in the dark regarding a moment of yen volatility that transpired more than an hour earlier.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气储量以五年最快速度增加
item.description: 今年冬季欧洲对天然气储备的依赖程度加深，在异常寒冷的天气下，本月天然气提取量达到五年来的最高水平。【原文：Europe is leaning more heavily on gas reserves this winter, with this month’s withdrawals running at the fastest pace in five years amid unusually cold weather.】

item.title: Euro-Zone Private Sector Steady as German Rebound Offsets France
item.description: (Bloomberg)—Private-sector activity in the euro area maintained moderate growth in January as Germany’s fledgling economic recovery helped offset weakness in France.

item.title: Hillhouse Is Said to Be Near Taking 17% Stake in Hong Kong’s Modern Dental
item.description: Hillhouse Investment is nearing a purchase of a significant minority stake in Hong Kong-listed Modern Dental Group Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Telefónica Brazil Passes Telefónica’s Market Cap for First Time
item.description: Telefónica Brazil SA’s value surpassed its parent Telefónica SA’s market capitalization for the first time ever, in the latest sign of the Spanish carrier’s struggles to win over investors.

item.title: Dollar Set for Worst Week Since June on US ‘Policy Nightmare’
item.description: The dollar is poised for its worst week since June as unpredictable US policymaking weighed on the currency ahead of next week’s Federal Reserve meeting.

item.title: German Private Sector Improves Amid ‘Fragile’ Economic Rebound
item.description: German private-sector activity picked up more than expected in January, bolstering expectations that the economy can finally mount a turnaround this year.

item.title: Prudential Japan Pledges Reforms After Widespread Misconduct
item.description: Prudential Financial Inc.’s Japan insurance head vowed to bolster governance after revelations that improper actions by more than 100 current and former staff cost customers about $20 million.

item.title: Taiwan Dollar Defies Global Volatility as Exporters Step In
item.description: The Taiwan dollar is exhibiting greater stability than its regional peers amid this week’s geopolitical headwinds as greenback sales from local exporters support the currency.

item.title: Chery to Buy Nissan’s South Africa Car Plant as Local Sales Soar
item.description: Chery Automobile Co. , China’s top car exporter, agreed to buy Nissan Motor Co.’s vehicle-manufacturing plant in South Africa soon after it grew to become the second-biggest vehicle retailer locally.

item.title: US Natural Gas Falls After Record-Breaking Three-Day Rally
item.description: US natural gas futures pared a record breaking three-day rally, after traders finished exiting short positions and the market braced for a historic winter storm.

item.title: Europe Poised to Import More LNG Than Ever This year, IEA Says
item.description: Europe will import record volumes of liquefied natural gas this year, deepening its reliance on the volatile global market, according to the International Energy Agency.

item.title: Gilts Head for Worst Week Since November on Political Jitters
item.description: Gilts are heading for their worst week in two months as the return of political risk in the country caps a turbulent spell for global bond markets.

item.title: Goldman, HSBC See Stronger European Stock Rally on Growth Bets
item.description: European stocks are poised to ride out trade and geopolitical tensions — as long as the economic outlook stays supportive, according to a Bloomberg survey.

item.title: French Business Activity Falls as Budget Drama Curbs Demand
item.description: Business activity in France shrank for the first time since October as political turmoil over the country’s budget weighed on demand.

item.title: Yen Gains Sharply Versus Dollar, Sparking Guessing Game on Cause
item.description: The yen advanced sharply versus the dollar on Friday, leaving traders guessing and on edge over what caused the move.

item.title: 李嘉诚考虑新股权结构以完成港口交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，李嘉诚旗下的和记黄埔有限公司正重新努力将数十个港口出售给一个全球财团，方法是将交易拆分成多个独立部分，并采用不同的所有权结构。【原文：Billionaire Li Ka-shing’s CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. is renewing efforts to sell dozens of ports to a global consortium by splitting the deal into separate parcels with different ownership structures, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴黎奢侈房产复苏势头趋缓，反富情绪日益高涨
item.description: 巴黎高端房产市场去年曾强劲复苏，但如今正遭受该国政治与财政动荡的冲击，加之反富情绪高涨，恐将驱离法国最富有的群体，一家高端房地产中介机构发出警告。【原文：The luxury property market in Paris, which saw a robust recovery last year, is being hit by the country’s political and budget turmoil and an anti-rich mood that risks driving France’s wealthiest away, a high-end real estate agency warned.】

item.title: 银价飙升助印度斯坦锌业成为印度最有价值金属企业
item.description: 白银价格的飙升推动印度斯坦锌业公司成为印度市值最大的金属企业，其市值超越了包括母公司韦丹塔公司在内的多家大型同行。【原文：A blistering rally in silver has propelled Hindustan Zinc Ltd. to become India’s biggest metals company by market capitalization, overtaking some of its largest peers, including parent Vedanta Ltd.】

item.title: 越南共产党任命杜林为五年任期领导人
item.description: 越南的杜珉成功连任执政党共产党总书记，任期长达五年，这巩固了他的领导地位，并赋予他继续推行激进的促进增长和投资议程的授权。【原文：Vietnam’s To Lam secured a full five-year term as head of the country’s ruling Communist Party, cementing his role and giving him a mandate to continue his aggressive pro-growth and investment agenda.】

item.title: 英国零售额在里夫斯预算案后迎来圣诞季提振
item.description: 英国零售业在关键的假日购物季实现复苏，消费者信心似乎在工党政府11月公布预算案后有所回升。【原文：UK retail sales recovered during the crucial holiday season, with consumers appearing to gain confidence after the Labour’s government’s November budget.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦维持基准利率在历史高位，通胀压力有所缓解
item.description: 尽管通胀率有所回落，哈萨克斯坦仍连续第二次将借贷成本维持在历史高位，因公用事业和燃料价格即将上涨，恐将再度引发通胀压力。【原文：Kazakhstan held borrowing costs at a record high for the second consecutive time despite a downtick in inflation as looming increases in utility and fuel prices threaten to rekindle pressure.】

item.title: 英镑兑美元汇率报1.35美元，股市平稳收官动荡一周
